comment: Best professor I have ever had at KSU!

BEST PROFESSOR EVER!!! If I could take him for everything, I would. He is very helpful, cares about you as a person and for you to do well. He is a very fair professor and is very knowledgeable. TAKE HIM, you won't regret it!
Take him. Thats my advice.

If you get the chance to take his courses, DO IT! Dr. Neiderjohn is great. He doesn't give a lot of assignments, so you have to do well on what's there. However, his lectures are clear and his powerpoints are online. You don't have to go to class, but you'll perform better if you do. He's pretty quiet, but he is helpful. I'd definitely recommend!

I decided to go ahead and provide to those that are looking to take Senior Seminar! TAKE HIM!!! I REPEAT TAKE HIM!!!!!!! He is very clear and easygoing! There will be 10 article review assignments and 5 of the 10 will be questions based on what you read in the article. There is a 12 pg paper and presentation and two film assignments!

Dr. Neiderjohn's lectures are great, clear and concise! Attendance is not mandatory, but I highly recommend it because he gives great examples to help make the information clear. Tests are half MC and half short essay. He's nice to look at and that always helps!

He is a fairly good professor.  His exams are reasonable if you study the ppts AND book.  He seems to enjoy teaching, and he is a counselor which broadens his lectures.  My only issue is that he has a "stand-offish" personality.  People call him quiet, but that's not quite right.  He doesn't appear to want students to talk to him.

Dr.Niederjohn is a great professor. Take him if you can. Your grade consists of 3 exams (20-mtpl choice/5-short essay)and a paper. He does not take attendance, but you will learn a lot more if you attend class.
Dr. Neiderjohn is a great guy! He is extremely easy going, funny and cute! Attendance is not mandatory, but it helps with the test. Get the book if you can, there is a lot of good info in it.

Dr. N is a awesome professor, one of the best the Psyc department has. The class is very interesting but not easy to recall because its so much.  I truly enjoyed his class because he takes pride in what he teaches & he loves it. The class is more of a discussion class so that makes it interesting.  I highly recommend Dr. N for any class he teaches
Great teacher. Get the textbook, some test material is from the book but not discussed in class. Not a super easy class, but not overly difficult either. Highly recommend this class.

Dr. Neiderjohn is a fantastic professor. His test can be challanging but not impossible, he makes class very interesting because he is interested in what he is teaching.  he is for sure the best professor at KSU!

Good teacher. Teaches mostly from power-point and examples. read text to better understand material. Tests mostly come from power-point and little text.Mild tempered and quiet natured. Welcomes class participation.  Overall good class.
He is a good teacher with an easy going personality.  Exams are tricky and you only have 3 and a paper.
Great professor. He loves what he does and it shows.
Great Professor! Really loves teaching! Highly recommended

He is pretty tough but interesting and relates stuff to things we know like everday life and relationships. There were 3 tests and a 10 page paper. The paper wasn't too hard. He does grade the tests pretty tough. Not completely clear whta's going to be on the tests but hes pretty easy to talk to if you have trouble. I would recommend him!

This is a very hard class! but he is really willing to work with you. You have to go to every class and study all the time. His tests are very hard. He is very picky on the short answer portion. He does not write many notes on powerpoint so you have to write down all that he says. Very hard class but hes very nice.
WHAT A GREAT TEACHER! He is so cute, I have a massive crush on him!

Very good teacher. The class was very interesting and he offers lots of extra credit.One paper and three tests. Paper he was very helpful with and graded kindly.Tests are multiple choice and fill in the blank.Gives a helpful study guide and notes are online. Easy class but must work to get a A

I was looking forward to this class, but was so disappointed. Notes were posted online so it was pointless to go class.  Even when I did attend class, I was counting down the minutes until it was over. Tests weren't bad, but he's a little maticulous on the short answers. I had to end up teaching the material to myself.

He is clearly very interested in the material, but the class ended up being a discussion based on other students issues...boring! Tests weren't bad, but he's picky on the short answer. He grades papers fairly, and overall he's a great guy!
Studying is a must, but great course.

His class is pretty boring unless you love psychology. Going into the class, i wasn't wild about it and he didn't spark my interest. His notes and study guides are on webct which make his tests easier and he gives great extra credit. He lectures which gets repetitive and boring, but he is such a nice guy!

A nice guy who actively shows his passion for psychology. Gives many examples. Sometimes lectures are a little dull but overall, he teaches the material in a easy understandable way. Study guides on WebCT help! No homework nor papers. Great professor!

If you don't mind lectures this is the teacher to take. He is great with explaining everything and gives plenty of examples to make it easy. He tries to get the class involved in his lectures and even does demonstrations. Overall great prof.
Great energy, genuine interest in teaching, cute too!
No Comments
GREAT teacher!  he is so cute and funny and he gives tons of examples to make the calss easy

Great Professor. Not sure on the grading yet, but extra credit opportunities along with getting a 70 on a test I KNOW I bombed (expected a 40-60%) earn him a 4 in easiness. Also, he didn't seem too anal about APA style for his paper, which is good. APA papers suck.
he's a great professor!  he really knows how to keep the subject interesting and fun, and he's a master of keeping a discussion going.
funny funny guy
Great professor, very helpful and funny! I would take any class he taught again!!
